m_descr:
Module to set presence switch according to connection state on FritzBox.
Check github.com/Eweol/Zway-FritzBox-Presence/ for detailed documentation.
device_name_label: Which device name present you Presence:
device_name_helper: Name of device in your Fritzbox witch show you are present or not.
fritz_ip_helper: The ip-address of your FritzBox. (If field is empty, 'fritz.box' would be used)
